text: Carlos Francisco Diassonama Panzo Bunga (born 24 September 1991 in Luanda, Angola), known as Chico, is an Angolan professional footballer who plays for Sagrada Esperança as a Striker. In 2018, he signed in for F.C. Bravos do Maquis. In 2019-20, he signed in for Sagrada Esperança in the Angolan league, the Girabola. ==References== ==External links== * Zerozero profile Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Angolan footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Girabola players Category:Atlético Sport Aviação players Category:C.R.D.
